query:
SELECT gl.gestorId, gl.lojaId, l.nome as loja_nome, l.email as loja_email, u.name as gestor_nome 
FROM gestor_lojas gl 
JOIN lojas l ON gl.lojaId = l.id 
JOIN gestores g ON gl.gestorId = g.id 
JOIN users u ON g.userId = u.id 
WHERE u.name LIKE '%Rui%' 
ORDER BY l.nome
